title: A vindication of the Reverend Mr. Alexander Osborn, in reference to the affairs of the north of Ireland in which some mistakes concerning him (in the printed account of the siege of Derry, the observations on it, and Mr. Walker's vindication of it) are rectified : and a brief relation of those affairs is given so far as Mr. Osborn, and other n.c. ministers in the north, were concern'd in 'em / written at Mr. Osborn's request by his friend Mr. J. Boyse.
author: Boyse, J. (Joseph), 1660-1728.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for Tho. Parkhurst, Tho. Cockerill, John Lawrence, and John Dunton ...,
